nodes.text: The Far Orbit Resort and Lodge was a place for hunters to go. It was founded around 40 standard years before the Battle of Yavin by an Ithorian and a Rodian. Business boomed during the Clone Wars, but slowed down during the Imperial Period.
The resort featured housing units, a cantina, and luxury outfittings as well as a storage warehouse. The resort employed several staff, including a man.
A group of lore-seekers arrived there to search for a rumored tomb.
The Far Orbit Resort and Lodge serves as the location for the first act of Lost Knowledge, the adventure in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 Star Wars: Force and Destiny Beginner Game book.
